titles.title: Safe Neighborhood Act of 1998
To amend the Fair Housing Act to provide an exemption for restrictions on the occupancy of group homes by persons convicted of certain crimes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

bill.summary: 10/13/1998--Introduced. Safe Neighborhood Act of 1998 - Amends the Fair Housing Act to permit reasonable Federal, State, or local restriction on group home occupancy by persons convicted of a crime for which a term of imprisonment was imposed.
